alert.note: Alert for Rains; Van Zandt (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 13 at 5:54PM CDT by NWS Dallas-Fort Worth
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of Van Zandt and Rains Counties through 630 PM CDT... At 553 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Wills Point, moving northeast at 40 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph and nickel size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Canton, Wills Point, Grand Saline, Van, Edgewood, Emory, East Tawakoni, Point, Fruitvale, Lake Tawakoni, Lake Fork Reservoir, Myrtle Springs, Whitton, Jackson, Oakland, Wise, Jones, Flats, Pruitt and Hermits Cove. This includes Interstate 20 between mile markers 513 and 542. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until 900 PM CDT for north central Texas.
